amendment.description: To repeal the requirement for the reduction of certain Survivor Benefit Plan annuities by the amount of dependency and indemnity compensation and to modify the effective date for paid-up coverage under the Survivor Benefit Plan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2424 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 92 - 6. Record Vote Number: 307.

action.text: Amendment SA 2424 proposed by Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S12378-12380; text: CR S12378) To repeal the requirement for the reduction of certain Survivor Benefit Plan annuities by the amount of dependency and indemnity compensation and to modify the effective date for paid-up coverage under the Survivor Benefit Plan.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2424 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 92 - 6. Record Vote Number: 307.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2424 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 92 - 6. Record Vote Number: 307.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2424 proposed by Senator Nelson FL.
